StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [M8412_Comment_Delete_Select_Comment]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID INT , @SeqNo INT = NULL
AS set nocount on
IF EXISTS(SELECT Person_ID FROM M8412_Comment WHERE Person_ID=@PersonID and Sequence_No= @SeqNo) DELETE FROM M8412_Comment WHERE Person_ID=@PersonID AND Sequence_No=@SeqNo
set nocount o.
